channel.title: Hugo on Thiago Araujo
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Thiago Araujo

item.title: Website with Hugo is a breeze
item.description: The goal of this post is twofold. First I want to help other people to build their static website without spending two important resources: time and money. Also, it is an explanation to my future self – as Damian Conway said: “Documentation is a love letter that you write to your future self‚Äù So, let’s get started. Hugo Link to heading Hugo is the framework we use to build our website.
